sense.gloss: appearing and disappearing, slipping in and out of view

sdata.j: ちょっと↑屈↑↓かが↓めば、アソコがチラチラと↑見↑↓|み↓え↑隠↑↓かく↓れ|します。
sdata.e: If you just crouch a little, her crotch can just be seen flicking in and out of sight.

sdata.j: ↑背後↑↓はいご↓に↑見↑↓|み↓え↑隠↑↓かく↓れ|するのは↑近年↑↓きんねん↓の↑不動産↑↓ふどうさん↓↑不況↑↓ふきょう↓だ。
sdata.e: What slips in and out of view in the background is the real estate slump of recent years.

sdata.j: ちょっと↑屈↑↓かが↓めば、↑信号↑↓しんごう↓↑旗↑↓き↓がチラチラと↑見↑↓|み↓え↑隠↑↓かく↓れ|します。
sdata.e: If you just crouch a little, the signal flag can just be seen flicking in and out of sight.
